item.title: Welcome to Kube
item.description: Welcome to Kube – an open source documentation like theme for Hugo Hi there and welcome to kube - my two theme for the static site generator hugo. kube is open source and can be found on kube. This article is just a demo post and shows you the style of common used elements. Bear claw danish chocolate lollipop soufflé jelly. Apple pie chocolate cake jelly-o icing bonbon. Gingerbread pastry fruitcake muffin chocolate bar cheesecake.

item.title: What is a blockchain?
item.description: **What is the blockchain and why is it so important. To understand blockchain and its use on cryptocurrencies lets back up a little, maybe a few hundred years. Imagine a prosperous medieval walled city called Hwen. Hwen is fully self sustained and has people from all backgrounds, from farmers to blacksmiths to builders to artists to folks who govern, Knights who protect etc. By the instruction of new Lord Emeric Jeanin, Hwen uses Gold as a method of transaction.
